cloudpolling

Class CloudConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloudpolling.CloudConnector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxConnector, DropBoxConnector, GoogleDriveConnector

    public abstract class CloudConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract base class for connections made by all cloud account types. This class handles sending message exchanges with information received from polling updates from cloud accounts.
    Author:
    tlarrue
